+++ [https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7036464540644609285?lang=en&is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1 Process Video] | [https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7036464540644609285?lang=en&is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1 Loop Video] | [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5733 SCP-5733] | [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6733 SCP-6733]
[[<]]
> **Filename:** 5733loop.mp4, 5733.gif
> **Author:** IronShears
> **License:** https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/
> **Source Link:** https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7036464540644609285?lang=en&is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1
> **Derivative of:** SCP-5733 by Dysadron
[[/<]]
-----
Apparently, I go bonkers on the pixel art for Dysadon articles? Lmaoooo. Either way, the SCENE is from SCP-5733 but the //colors// are from SCP-6733. **Read both** these honestly might be my new favorite articles.

When I saw SCP-6733 I realized I hadn't read 5733 yet so I read that one first. And by the end of I was like "This was good as hell there's no way 6733 stands up to it" but it DID. They're both GREAT articles on their own and you don't NEED to read the first one to get it but it just adds a whole bunch to it. 

Honestly? Go read both of them. I linked both above next to the process video link. They're incredible.

(Oh yeah, I'm also trying a thing where I upload the loop and process videos on different days? maybe posting on more days will do better on TikTok.) 
 
+ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:art-mycotherapy More Art Mycotherapy]
[[/=]]

author: IronShears
